title: Orc Scout (2C89)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Minion • Orc
Strength:	6
Vitality:	2
Site:	6
Game Text:	Tracker. The roaming penalty for each [Sauron] minion you play is -1. Response: If an event is played that spots or exerts a ranger, exert or discard this minion to cancel that event.
Lore:	”'Orc!…Not very near, and yet too near, it seems.'”
Rarity:	C
Notes:	The special ability of this minion may only cancel an event that specifically requires a ranger in its game text.
